data.text: Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Babilonian nguibar ekiam mɨgei,
Nɨ ingangarir amizir kɨnimɨn mɨn ingaram.
Israelian Godɨn Bar Zuezim, a en Akurvazir Gumazim.
Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Babilonia mɨgei,
Kɨ bar puvɨra uan gumazamizibar atari,
Nɨ ghaze, nɨ atrivir amizimɨn ikɨ mamaghɨra ikiam,
Ezɨ noka, arazir kamning zuamɨra nɨ bativam.
“Kamaghɨn ti dera, nɨ igiamra ikia imeziba ko akavsiar gavgavibar fofoziba inigha dagh amua fozɨ moghɨn,
Fofozir gumazir avɨriba nɨghnɨzim nɨ ganɨdima,
“Ezɨ puvatɨ, me mati ogheba mɨsigha iti, ezɨ avir mam gumazir kabar isi me gasɨghasɨgham.
